user.name: Name

user.oneTimePasswordModalText: Are you sure you want to create a one-time password for the user? After the process, the user's password will be changed and the new password will be displayed on the screen. After logging in with this password, the user will be directed to the new password setting screen.

user.passwordRegex: Your password must have minimum six characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
